Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 115th/Laflin
ShortDescription: #115 buses temp. rerouted SB via 115th, Halsted, 111th, Marshfield; Ashland-Hamlet, 111th, Halsted, 115th, due to police activity near 115th/Laflin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 115th/Laflin due to police activity .

Southbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 111th, and Marshfield, then resume their normal route on 115th.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland-Hamlet, 111th, and Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th

Allow extra travel time.
